name: Draven Shadowhammer
description: A brooding dwarf blacksmith with a mysterious past, known for crafting weapons of unparalleled quality.

name: Elara Moondust
description: An elven druid with silver hair and a connection to the moon, devoted to preserving the balance of nature.

name: Thrain Stonebeard
description: A grizzled and stout dwarven warrior with a love for tales of ancient battles and a penchant for wielding a massive warhammer.

name: Isolde Stormazure
description: A charismatic and adventurous sorceress, her lightning spells are as unpredictable as her personality.

name: Zephyr Stormwing
description: A roguish air genasi with windswept hair, skilled in stealth and archery, navigating both cities and wilderness with ease.

name: Lyria Dragonheart
description: A dragonborn paladin with scales as radiant as her noble spirit, sworn to protect the innocent and vanquish evil.

name: Kael Firedawn
description: A tiefling warlock with fiery horns and a devilish charm, whose powers stem from a pact made in the heart of a volcano.

name: Seraphina Skyblue
description: An aasimar cleric with celestial wings, healing the wounded and bringing hope to those in despair.

name: Gideon Ironforge
description: A stoic and disciplined human knight, skilled in swordplay and known for his unyielding loyalty to his allies.

name: Evelina Bladebane
description: A nimble and cunning halfling rogue, always one step ahead in both wit and skill, with a rapier as swift as her tongue.

name: Ragnar Shadowfox
description: A sly and cunning tiefling rogue with a talent for infiltration and a love for acquiring rare and valuable artifacts.

name: Fiora Windwhisper
description: A graceful and enigmatic elf bard, captivating audiences with haunting melodies and stories of ancient elven lore.

name: Zara Silvermoon
description: An intelligent and strategic half-elf ranger, master of the bow, and adept at tracking foes through dense forests.

name: Malachai Skullsword
description: A fierce and battle-hardened half-orc barbarian, wielding a massive sword and known for his intimidating presence on the battlefield.

name: Elowen Starsea
description: A wise and serene water genasi sorceress, with a deep connection to the ocean and the mysterious powers it holds.
